main_definition: in the following time or at a later point in time

meanings_and_examples.definition: to do something after another thing has been done
meanings_and_examples.example: First, I finished my homework, and afterwards, I went for a run.

meanings_and_examples.definition: in the near future or at a later time
meanings_and_examples.example: We will discuss this issue further afterwards when we meet next week.

meanings_and_examples.definition: as a result of something that happened previously
meanings_and_examples.example: After she apologized, they started talking again afterwards.
